mapper.select:
select a.id,a.comp_id,a.comm_id,a.bill_id,a.alter_fee,a.alter_reason,a.alter_by,a.alter_time,a.audi_reason, a.auditor,a.audit_time,a.state,a.remark, r.name as costRuleName, b.account_period,b.property_type,b.property_id, (CASE WHEN b.property_type = '房产' THEN (SELECT DISTINCT concat( bd.no, '-', unit.no, '-', room.room_no ) FROM r_room room,r_building bd,r_unit unit WHERE room.id = b.property_id AND room.building_id = bd.id AND room.unit_id = unit.id ) ELSE ( SELECT DISTINCT p.no FROM r_parking_space p WHERE p.id = b.property_id ) END) AS propertyName, b.price,b.state as billState, u.name as alterByName,u2.name as auditorName,u2.user_name as userName, comp.name as compName,comm.name as commName from f_bill_alter a,f_bill b,f_cost_rule r,s_company comp,r_community comm,s_user u,s_auditer_cnf au,s_user u2
,s_user_comm uc
where a.bill_id = b.id and b.cost_rule_id = r.id and a.comp_id = comp.id and a.comm_id = comm.id and a.alter_by = u.id and a.auditor = au.id and au.user_id = u2.id
and uc.user_id=#{userId} and a.comm_id=uc.comm_id
